All Saints Term*:

Tuesday 9 November(28 September)* 2004: Daily Office & Eucharist

Tuesday 16 November(5 October)* 2004: Occasional Services

Tuesday 23 November(12 October)* 2004: Rubrics and Catechism

Tuesday 30 November(19 October)* 2004: Personal and Family Prayer

Tuesday 6 December(26 October)* 2004: 39 Articles and Historic Prefaces

*Because we will be rehearsing Nutcracker during the All Saints term, we will be doing this term in Michaelmas timeframe instead.
